resources.string: Oops... you are not at the right step of the installation
Either you have already completed this step or you accidently went too far ahead. The next step for you is ‘{nextStep}’.
There is no device installed in this home yet.
Here you get help to install your tado°.
Get Help from the Technical Support
Please register your tado° Smart Radiator Thermostat
Find the registration information on the Smart Radiator Thermostat or on the card provided by your installer.
Please register your tado° Internet Bridge
Find the registration information on the Internet Bridge or on the card provided by your installer.
You have successfully installed your tado° Smart AC Control. Have fun using it!
Please select the positioning of your device.
Guide the cable out on the bottom. Adapt the cable length by storing the cable in the back. Use the adhesive strips for the wall mounting.
Guide the cable out on the top. Adapt the cable length by storing the cable in the back.
Find a place for the Smart AC Control
The Smart AC control will continuously send command signals to the AC to make sure the position you choose works.
Do not restart the router or unplug the device while updating. The update can take up to 60 minutes.
These email addresses do not have the right format: {emailAddresses}
This email address does not have the right format.
Send an invitation to your fellow roommates to allow them control the AC, too.
Enter the serial number and auth code - find them on the back of the device.
Serial number and auth code do not match.
Please enter the device auth code.
Please enter the device serial number.
This device is already registered to another home. If the serial number is correct, please contact our support: tado.com/support
The entered device serial number is not a tado° Smart AC Control.
Test the commands you have just recorded
All recordings will be deleted. Are you sure you want to start over?
All recordings for this mode will be deleted. Are you sure you want to reteach {modeName} mode?
Something must have gone wrong while recording.
Point your Smart AC Control towards your AC for testing
Test if your AC responds correctly.

Please only turn your AC on and off via your tado°.
If you find your AC to be on/off while tado shows the opposite you can resync tado° and your AC via your remote control.

Because the remote control interface of your AC is very limited, tado° can only set the temperature if you keep your AC set to cool mode.
If your AC has an Eco or Saver mode, you can also choose to keep your AC set to one of these modes.
Point the Smart AC Control towards the AC unit
You can test the recorded command signals in the next step.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Press the remote control button only once in 5 seconds.
Point your remote control at your Smart AC Control and press the temperature down button.
Point your remote control at the Smart AC Control
In the next steps the Smart AC Control records command signals of your remote control. The distance should be max. 20 cm (8 inches).
Point your remote control at your Smart AC Control and press the temperature up button.
Point your remote control at your Smart AC Control and press the Power (On/Off) button.
The temperature must be between {minTemp} and {maxTemp}.
Set your AC to **Cool mode**. Press the temperature up button until you reach the **highest temperature**.
The temperature must be between {minTemp} and {maxTemp}.
Set your AC to **Cool mode**. Press the temperature down button until you reach the **lowest temperature**.
Your AC will be controlled with this command set. Please make sure all commands work.
Try and choose which of the {availableCommandSetCount} possible command signal sets works best.
Note: we do not support blowing direction and special modes like Eco right now.
Set the following settings on your remote
Does {modeName} mode have an “Auto” fan speed?
The temperature must be between 59°F and {maxTemp}°F.
The temperature must be between 15°C and {maxTemp}°C.
Set your AC to **{modeName} mode**. Press the temperature down button until you reach the **lowest temperature**.
Choose all possible options the {modeName} mode has
The temperature must be between 60°F and 89°F.
The temperature must be between 16°C and 31°C.
Set your AC to **{modeName} mode**. Press the temperature up button until you reach the **highest temperature**.
How many fan speeds are supported by your AC in this mode besides Auto?

Currently only 3 fan speeds (Low, Medium, High) and Auto are supported. Because you have more fan speeds, please choose the lowest for Low, a medium for Medium and the highest speed for High when you are asked to set a fan speed later in the process.
How many fan speeds are supported by your AC in this mode?
Sorry but something went wrong. We could not record a command signal. Do you want to retry the last recording or restart the whole run?
Your remote always sends all settings at a time. So you need to go through the possible combinations. But we will guide you.
Point your remote control at the Smart AC Control
In the next steps the Smart AC Control records command signals of your remote control. The distance should be max. 20 cm (8 inches).
If you end teaching now, you will only be able to use the modes already taught.
Choose the next mode to teach
**{Brand}** is not the brand of your AC? Select another brand.
The Smart AC Control might not have had visual contact to the AC: move it closer, point more accurately to the AC and try again.
The selected AC brand has no command signal sets.
For {acBrand} there are {commandSetCount} command signals in our database. Find out which one works with your AC.
For {acBrand} there is 1 command signal in our database. Find out if it works with your AC.
We will go through the command signals one by one. Please answer for each if your AC is reacting to the on/off signals sent by the Smart AC Control.
For the next steps, hold it like a remote control with the front or bottom side toward the AC.
Point the Smart AC Control towards the AC unit
tado° will send several signals to your AC. Decide for each if the AC responds. This will take a few minutes.
Connecting to the server has failed. Please check your Internet connection.
Connecting to the server has failed. Please check your Internet connection.
Choose the modes your AC supports
Please get your remote control to find out which functions your AC has.
You need to teach the commands of your remote control to the Smart AC Control.
Your Smart AC Control is downloading all command signals for your AC.
The download of the command signals for your AC failed. Please go to troubleshooting.
The setup for your AC is complete now!
No brand with this name found.
Does your AC have a display?
Choose the temperature unit of your AC
What does the display of the remote control show?
Choose the type of remote control you have
In all other cases refer to our troubleshooting guide.
If the display of your Smart AC Control shows the number {fourDigitSerial} restart the connection process.
Your Smart AC Control is now connected to the server.
Your Smart AC Control takes longer than expected to join your Wi-Fi and connect to the server.
Make sure that your mobile is connected to the internet. It might not have reconnected to your home Wi-Fi.
Your Smart AC Control tries to join your Wi-Fi and to connect to the server. This can take up to 2 minutes.
Please enter the name of the Wi-Fi network.
Please select the security of your Wi-Fi.
Please enter the password for the Wi-Fi.
Please enter a password with at least 8 characters.
No Wi-Fi Networks were found by your Smart AC Control.
You are not connected to any Wi-Fi network. Please connect to the Wi-Fi **{tadoSsid}** of your Smart AC Control.
Connecting to your Smart AC Control has failed. Please retry.
You are not connected to the Wi-Fi network of your Smart AC Control. Please connect to the Wi-Fi **{tadoSsid}**.
Please make sure you are connected to your Wi-Fi network and there is Internet connection. Restart the app to try again.
No Wi-Fi networks were found by your Smart AC Control.
Connect to your Smart AC Control to set up the Wi-Fi connection.

Open the Wi-Fi section in the settings and select the network **{tadoSsid}**.
If it is not in the list, select Other… and enter the name **{tadoSsid}** manually.
Searching for your Smart AC Control.
Plug the USB cable on the back of the device and connect to power.
My tado° is already installed. I want to connect it to my account
How do you want to install your tado° devices?
Install myself with customised step-by-step instructions
To proceed with the installation please call our customer support. You can find the right number for your country in our [Help Center](https://tado.com/support).
You have finished the installation. You can now add additional devices to your home or download the mobile app.
Smart Radiator Thermostats in the same zone are synchronised. If you change the temperature on one the others are notified.
Select the zone, in which the Smart Radiator Thermostat is located.
The following devices are not completely installed. Please choose a device to resume the installation.
Use tado° mobile app for installation
For installation of the Smart AC Control, please download the tado° mobile app in the App Store, Google play or Windows Store with your smart phone or tablet.
To install your Connector Kit please call our customer support. You can find the right number for your country in our [Help Center](https://tado.com/support).
For installation open **www.tado.com/login** on your tablet, PC or Mac.
For installation open **hager.com/smartthermostat/start** on your tablet, PC or Mac.
For installation open **www.tado.com/login** on your tablet, PC or Mac.
For installation open **www.tado.com/login** on your tablet, PC or Mac.
Which installer has installed your tado° devices?
Please ask your installer for it.
